plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be drama, as many of the movies listed fall into that category. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be character-driven, as many of the movies focus on the development of the characters. The user's favourite kind of musical score is likely to be orchestral, as many of the movies have an orchestral soundtrack. The user's favourite mood for the musical score is likely to be sombre, as many of the movies have a melancholic tone. The user's favourite setting is likely to be modern, as many of the movies are set in the present day. The user's favourite visual style is likely to be realistic, as many of the movies have a naturalistic look. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be naturalistic, as many of the movies have a realistic dialogue. The user's favourite runtime is likely to be between 90 and 120 minutes, as many of the movies are of that length. The user's favourite themes are likely to be relationships, family, and identity.
